metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16856 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.Description: In a default Red Hat Openstack Platform Director installation,openstack-octavia before versions openstack-octavia 2.0.2-5 andopenstack-octavia-3.0.1-0.20181009115732 creates log files that arereadable by all users. Sensitive information such as private keys canappear in these log files allowing for information exposure.

criterions.comment: octavia package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
